data.title: Animal Crossing: News, Guides, Tips and Tricks, and More
data.meta_description: Animal Crossing: New Horizons stretches the definition of what a game even is. Still, it’s managed to capture the hearts of millions. This is the island getaway we all need right now.
data.text:
Cold Stone’s Nintendo-themed ice cream sundaes are a sweet way to beat the heatwave

I tried all three of Cold Stone's Nintendo-themed ice cream flavors. You know, for journalistic purposes.

How to make money in Animal Crossing: New Horizons

Paying off a home loan is stressful, so every little bit helps on a remote island. Learn tips and tricks to make big bells in Animal Crossing: New Horizons.

How to get Sanrio villagers and items in Animal Crossing: New Horizons

Interested in getting the new rare Sanrio items or villagers with the latest Animal Crossing: New Horizons update? These steps will help you gather them all.

How to get Super Mario items in Animal Crossing: New Horizons

Bring Mario to your island. If you want to get your hands on all the Super Mario items available in Animal Crossing: New Horizons, here's a guide.

How to get a ladder in Animal Crossing: New Horizons

Some areas of your island are above sea level. Here's how to craft the ladder in Animal Crossing: New Horizons. It all starts with Tom Nook and earning miles.

How to add friends in Animal Crossing: New Horizons

Animal Crossing: New Horizons is way better with friends, but finding out how to add them can be tricky.

Animal Crossing: New Horizons Turkey Day guide

If you want to get a (turkey) leg up on what to expect from this year's Turkey Day in Animal Crossing: New Horizons, here's a full guide on how to prepare.

The best gifts for Nintendo Switch owners

Looking to buy something fun for that special Switch owner in your life? Look no further.

The best Animal Crossing games, ranked from best to worst

Whether you're a seasoned villager or looking for a new game to relax with, we've taken the best Animal Crossing games and ranked them from best to worst.

Animal Crossing: New Horizons ordinances guide

Considering how long it's been, and how many people may not have played a game with them, here's a full guide on ordinances in Animal Crossing: New Horizons.

Animal Crossing: New Horizons terraforming guide

Terraforming is brand new to the Animal Crossing world. This guide will explain how to unlock terraforming in Animal Crossing: New Horizons and how to use it.

How to unlock Katrina in Animal Crossing: New Horizons

Animal Crossing: New Horizons is jumping into the mysterious world of fortune-telling with Katrina. Here's how to unlock the character and improve your luck.

Animal Crossing: New Horizons’ 2.0 update isn’t enough to save it

The Animal Crossing 2.0 update brings new content and old characters, but it's not enough to warrant a full return.

How to find Brewster and unlock the Roost in Animal Crossing: New Horizons

To help you find Brewster and unlock The Roost for your island in Animal Crossing: New Horizons, we'll show all the steps that you need to do to set up shop.

How to cook in Animal Crossing: New Horizons

Get your chef's hat ready! If you want to know everything about how to cook in Animal Crossing: New Horizons, we've got a step-by-step recipe for you to follow.

How to get a 5-star island in Animal Crossing: New Horizons

One of the coveted goals in Animal Crossing: New Horizons is to get a five-star island. In this guide, we'll break down everything you'll need to earn one.

Animal Crossing: New Horizons beginner’s guide

Animal Crossing: New Horizons offers more possibilities than ever, and there are many ways to explore island life. Here's our beginner's guide for new players.

How to use photo mode in Animal Crossing: New Horizons

Animal Crossing: New Horizons features a robust photo mode that allows players to capture their creations in the best light possible. Here is how it works.

The best Animal Crossing-themed Switch accessories

Whether you're looking for a Nook-themed console or a K.K. Slider controller, there are several Animal Crossing accessories available for the Nintendo Switch.

Why does so much official video game apparel miss the mark?

Now that video game-themed apparel is considered trendy rather than nerdy, lots of companies are cashing in on clothing lines.
